Name: The Shrieking Moors
Description: This region is blanketed in seemingly endless fields of grey-yellow grass, the wind echoing a woman’s scream.

Name: The Black Forests
Description: This region is dark and gloomy, the sun greyed out by the canopy above.

Name: The Silver Cliffs
Description: This region is dominated by sheer cliffs of white stone.

Name: The Burning Plains
Description: This region burns with a fiery heat, despite the sun blotted out by the ash of spewing volcano.  A gleaming city and a stone pyramid can both be seen in the distance.

Name: Ruins of the Tyranny
Description: The ruined glory of the Tyranny’s capital seem to stretch endlessly, lit by the sickly green glow of arcane technology.
